warscrolls.name: Hedkrakka's Madmob
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Infantry, Champion, Ward (6+), Destruction, Bonesplitterz, Orruk

abilities.name: Go For Da Eyes
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Shooting Phase
abilities.declare: If this unit’s **Dakko Sharp-Stikka** is on the battlefield, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. Add 1 to the roll if the target is a **MONSTER**. On a 4+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Hedkrakka, Gob of Gork
abilities.effect: While this unit’s **Hedkrakka, Gob of Gork**, is on the battlefield, it has **WIZARD (1)**.

warscrolls.name: Kragnos, the End of Empires
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Warmaster, Unique, Hero, Monster, Ward (5+), Destruction, Bonesplitterz

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of **The Dread Mace** is 4 and this unit has a Control characteristic of 10.

abilities.name: The Shield Inviolate
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: Opponent declared a SPELL ability
abilities.effect: If this unit was picked to be the target of that spell, roll a dice. On a 3+, ignore the effect of that spell on this unit. This unit can use this ability more than once per phase but only once per **SPELL** ability.

abilities.name: Avatar of Destruction
abilities.effect: If this unit would be automatically destroyed, it is not automatically destroyed. Instead, allocate 6 damage points to it (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points).

abilities.name: The End of Empires
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, add 1 to the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for friendly **DESTRUCTION** units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit, to a maximum of 3.

abilities.name: Rampaging Destruction
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Charge Phase
abilities.effect:
If this unit charged this phase, pick 1 of the following effects:

• Roll a dice for each enemy unit within 1" of this unit. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that unit equal to the roll.
• Pick an enemy **MONSTER** in combat with this unit and roll 2D6. On a 7, this ability has no effect. Otherwise, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that unit equal to the results on the dice used for the 2D6 roll multiplied together. For example, a 2D6 roll of 2 and 6 would inflict 12 mortal damage (2 × 6).

warscrolls.name: Maniak Weirdnob
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Wizard (1), Cavalry, Ward (6+), Destruction, Bonesplitterz

abilities.name: Bone Spirit
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **BONESPLITTERZ CAVALRY** unit within this unit’s combat range to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, add 1 to wound rolls for the target’s combat attacks for the rest of the turn. This ability also affects **Companion** weapons.

abilities.name: Havin' A Good Old Rukk
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared a FIGHT ability for this unit
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly non-**HERO BONESPLITTERZ INFANTRY** unit that has not used a **FIGHT** ability this turn and is within this unit’s combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a **FIGHT** ability immediately after the **FIGHT** ability used by this unit has been resolved. If it is picked to do so, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the target’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Da Final Fling
abilities.effect: While this unit is not in combat, each time a model in this unit is slain by a shooting attack and that model was within 12" of the attacking unit, roll a dice. Add 2 to the roll if the attacking unit was a **MONSTER**. On a 4+, inflict D6 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the **SHOOT** ability has been resolved.

warscrolls.name: Savage Boarboy Maniaks
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Champion, Musician (1/5), Standard Bearer (1/5), Ward (6+), Destruction, Bonesplitterz

abilities.name: On a Tear
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Reaction: You declared a CHARGE ability for this unit
abilities.effect: Add 5 to this unit’s control score for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Savage Boarboys
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Champion, Musician (1/5), Standard Bearer (1/5), Ward (6+), Destruction, Bonesplitterz

abilities.name: Wild Enthusiasm
abilities.effect: This unit can use the ‘Power Through’ command even if it has not charged this turn. In addition, when you pick a target for that command, the target does not have to have a lower Health characteristic than this unit.

warscrolls.name: Savage Orruk Arrowboys
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Musician (1/10), Standard Bearer (1/10), Ward (6+), Destruction, Bonesplitterz

abilities.name: Aim Fer Its Eyes
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle Round (Army), Any Shooting Phase
abilities.declare: If all of the attacks made with this unit’s **Stinga Bows** this turn targeted the same enemy unit, pick that enemy unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. Add 1 to the roll if the target is a **BEAST** or **CAVALRY** unit, or add 2 to the roll if the target is a **MONSTER**. On a 4+, subtract 1 from the Attacks characteristic of the target’s **Companion** weapons for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Savage Orruk Morboys
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Musician (1/10), Standard Bearer (1/10), Ward (6+), Destruction, Bonesplitterz

abilities.name: Morboy Fury
abilities.effect: If this unit charged this turn, enemy units cannot use commands while they are in combat with this unit.

warscrolls.name: Savage Orruks
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Musician (1/10), Standard Bearer (1/10), Ward (6+), Destruction, Bonesplitterz

abilities.name: The Savage Hordes
abilities.effect: Add 10 to the control score of this unit while it is in combat with any enemy units that charged this turn.

warscrolls.name: Wardokk
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Priest (1), Infantry, Ward (6+), Destruction, Bonesplitterz

abilities.name: Primal Hex
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy **WIZARD** within 24" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, until the start of your next turn, each time the target uses a **SPELL** or **UNBIND** ability, this unit gains 1 ritual point.

warscrolls.name: Wurrgog Prophet
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Wizard (2), Infantry, Ward (6+), Destruction, Bonesplitterz

abilities.name: Wurrgog Mask
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), Your Shooting Phase
abilities.effect:
For the rest of the turn:

• The Attacks characteristic of this unit’s **Deadly Green Bolts** is 12 instead of D6.
• For each unmodified hit roll of 1 for a shooting attack made by this unit, inflict D3 mortal damage on this unit after the **SHOOT** ability has been resolved.

abilities.name: Squiggly Curse
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy **HERO** in combat with the caster to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Inflict D3 mortal damage on the target. If the target is destroyed by this spell, add 1 to this unit’s power level for the rest of the battle.

rules.name: Tireless Trackers
rules.effect: Half the friendly non-**HERO BONESPLITTERZ INFANTRY** units on the battlefield (rounding up) can immediately use the ‘Normal Move’ ability as if it were your movement phase.

rules.name: Squint-eye Taktiks
rules.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Shooting Phase
rules.declare: Pick an enemy unit on the battlefield to be the target.
rules.effect: For the rest of the turn, hit rolls for shooting attacks made by friendly **Savage Orruk Arrowboys** units that target the target unit score critical hits on unmodified hit rolls of 5+.

rules.name: Realm-chompers
rules.effect: Ward rolls cannot be made for enemy units while they are within the combat range of any friendly **BONESPLITTERZ HEROES.**

spells.name: Gorkamorka's War Cry
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **BONESPLITTERZ WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Until the start of your next turn, subtract 1 from the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for the target, to a minimum of 1.

spells.name: Fists of Gork
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **BONESPLITTERZ WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Roll a dice for each model in the target unit. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

spells.name: Glowy Green Frenzy
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **BONESPLITTERZ WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of the target’s melee weapons until the start of your next turn, including **Companion** weapons.

spells.name: Grimdokk Dance
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **BONESPLITTERZ PRIEST** to chant this prayer, pick a visible friendly **BONESPLITTERZ** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
spells.effect: **Heal (3)** the target unit or return a number of slain models to it with a combined Health characteristic of up to 3. If the chanting roll for this prayer was 9+, instead, **Heal (6)** the target unit or return a number of slain models to it with a combined Health characteristic of up to 6.

spells.name: Bashdokk Dance
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **BONESPLITTERZ PRIEST** to chant this prayer, pick a visible friendly **BONESPLITTERZ** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
spells.effect: Add 1 to charge rolls and run rolls for the target for the rest of the turn. If the chanting roll was 7+, in addition, for the rest of the turn, the target can use **CHARGE** abilities even if it used a **RUN** or **RETREAT** ability in the same turn.

spells.name: Weirdokk Dance
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **BONESPLITTERZ PRIEST** to chant this prayer. Then make a chanting roll of D6.
spells.effect:
Subtract 1 from chanting rolls and casting rolls for enemy **PRIESTS** and **WIZARDS** while they are within 18" of the chanter until the start of your next turn.

In addition, if the chanting roll was 11+, enemy **PRIESTS** within 18" of the chanter each lose D6 ritual points and enemy **WIZARDS** cannot use **UNBIND** abilities while they are within 18" of the chanter until the start of your next turn.

artefacts.name: Dokk Juice
artefacts.effect: If this unit would be destroyed, before removing it from play, roll a dice. On a 3+, this unit is not destroyed and any remaining damage points inflicted on it have no effect. Then, **Heal (1)** this unit. This unit cannot use this ability again for the rest of the battle.

artefacts.name: Monsta-killa Chompa
artefacts.effect: This unit has **STRIKE-FIRST** while it is in combat with an enemy **BEAST** or **MONSTER**.

heroicTraits.name: 'Orrible Leer
heroicTraits.effect: Enemy **MONSTERS** cannot use **RAMPAGE** abilities while they are in combat with this unit.

heroicTraits.name: One Wiv Da Beast
heroicTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), Any Hero Phase
heroicTraits.effect: The next time this phase that this unit uses a **SPELL** ability, instead of making a casting roll for this unit, you can use a value of 6 for the roll that cannot be modified.

battleTraits.name: Take Da Bait
battleTraits.declare: Pick up to 3 friendly **BONESPLITTERZ** units to be the targets.
battleTraits.effect: For the rest of the battle, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of each target’s melee weapons while it is in combat with an enemy unit that charged in the same turn, and so long as the target has not charged during the battle.

battleTraits.name: Spring The Trap
battleTraits.effect: Add 1 to wound rolls for friendly **BONESPLITTERZ** units that charged in the same turn.

battleTraits.name: Monster Hunters
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Charge Phase
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **BONESPLITTERZ** unit in combat with an enemy **MONSTER** to be the target.
battleTraits.effect: For the rest of the turn, add 1 to wound rolls for the target’s combat attacks and add 1 to save rolls for the target.

battleTraits.name: Bonesplitterz Waaagh!
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), Your Hero Phase
battleTraits.declare: Pick each friendly **BONESPLITTERZ WIZARD** and **BONESPLITTERZ PRIEST** to be the targets.
battleTraits.effect: Add 1 to the power level of each target for the rest of the turn. In addition, friendly **BONESPLITTERZ** units have **WARD** (**5+)** for the rest of the turn.
